base_description: Tall, rectangular, gray cabinet with four drawers.
part_description: Four evenly spaced drawers, rectangular shape, front-facing handles, stacked vertically. Each drawer has a centered handle, and the cabinet stands on a flat base.
internal_interaction_description: Each drawer slides in and out smoothly within the cabinet frame. The handles are fixed to the front of each drawer, allowing for easy opening and closing. The drawers are aligned and supported by internal rails, ensuring stability and ease of use.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet interacts with users by providing storage space. The handles allow users to pull drawers open and push them closed. It can be placed against a wall or in a corner, interacting with its environment by occupying floor space and possibly supporting items on top.
